extends WindowManager<java.awt.Window>

      • findInternalWindowName

        @Nullable
java.lang.String findInternalWindowName(@Nonnull
                                                  javax.swing.JInternalFrame window)
        Lookups a name related to a JInternalFrame.
        Parameters:
        window - the window to be looked up
        Returns:
        the name of the window if it's managed by this manager, null otherwise.

        Lookups the index related to a JInternalFrame.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
